member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO
member.summary: The OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO structure contains a basic online certificate status protocol (OCSP) response as specified by RFC 2560. The RFC specifies that a single response can contain a sequence of certificates for which statuses are provided. The rgResponseEntry member of this structure contains an structure for each certificate in a sequence.

summary.para: A value that indicates the protocol version of the response.
A value that indicates the type of ID the responder used in this response.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.ByNameResponderId
member.summary: A CERT_NAME_BLOB structure that contains the subject name of the responder signing certificate.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.ByKeyResponderId
member.summary: A CRYPT_HASH_BLOB that contains a hash of the responder signing certificate public key.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO.ProducedAt
member.summary: The date and time at which the response was signed.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO.cResponseEntry
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgResponseEntry array.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO.rgResponseEntry
member.summary: An array of pointers to structures, each of which contains a certificate status.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgExtension array.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_INFO.rgExtension
member.summary: An array of pointers to structures, each of which contains additional information about the response.
